options.content:
Consumption in kWh
  Meter Reading (in m³)
x Volumetric Correction (pressure/temp)
x Calorific Value (energy in each m³)
÷ 3.6 (convert from joules)

panels.description: Source: Octograph (& Octopus API via curl into NodeExporter for pricing)
panels.title: Octopus Energy - Consumption & Cost (per day)
Gas UNIT Usage Cost in Interval

targets.query: SELECT sum("total_cost")  / sum("consumption") / 100 FROM "electricity" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.description:
Source: Consumption=Octopus; Cost=Octopus
Octopus reports every 24hrs so we can only start with previous day's readings to compare.

panels.description:
Source: Octopus & ShellyEM
Octopus reports every 24hrs so we can only start with previous day's readings to compare. Octopus reading lag 1hr behind ShellyEM

targets.query: SELECT sum("consumption") * 1000 FROM "electricity" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval,-30m) fill(linear)

panels.title: Electricity Consumption - ShellyEM vs Octopus Consumption

panels.description: Source: ShellyEM

targets.query: SELECT difference(last("0_total")) FROM "shellyem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h) fill(linear)

list.description: Energy in each m^3 of gas - appears to stay constant year-round. Used to convert m^3 meter readings to kWh. [Get from latest bill]
list.label: (Gas) Calorific Value
list.name: gas_cal_value

list.description: Adjustment to correct for pressure/temperature - appears to stay consistent year-round (get from last bill)
list.label: (Gas) Volumetric Correction
list.name: gas_vol_correction
